text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: 50 seconds remain. Ms. Flash, the crown at the top is 1.5 cm to the right of the planned position.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: I'll fix it. 1.5cm… Good, we're done…!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text: —Time's Up! A big thank you to all contestants!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text: Now then, let's get right to the judging! Representatives from each team, please introduce your works!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Whoa, doesn't our cake look stupendous? Like, I totally wanna dig in!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: —Haa! We're next! My heart is bakushining～…!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text: Next up, Japan Uma Musume Training Center Academy! Please present your work.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Yes. I'm Eishin Flash from Tracen Academy. We wanted to express… "the dedication to victory", as the image of our academy.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Our school, Tracen Academy, is a prestigious domestic racing school, where only horsegirls are enrolled. Everyone spends their days racing and competing against each other.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: However, we can't just be training from morning to evening.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: … The girls greeting people early in the morning, those who take care of their nails during recess, or tend to flower beds on a daily basis…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Those fervently chasing their idol dreams, or working as models, those stuck in the student council room, and fortune telling afficionados…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Worrying about their studies, their friendships, and their own qualities… Many different days are spent at that academy.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: But at the same time, there is one conviction they all share. Their "dedication to victory" — "the desire to win".

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: We projected our school's unique pride onto our cake.

text_block_list.name: Judge
text_block_list.text: I see. "Eclipse first, the rest nowhere" — that's the school motto of Tracen Academy, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Yes, "The one who stands without equal". …Perhaps nothing describes it better.

text_block_list.name: Judge
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much. A magnificent display. Not only of your work, but also of your earnest fondness for your academy.
(Clap clap clap…)
Now then, it is time to announce the winning team of this year's Yuushun Chocolate Contest!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: And you came in second! Aww, ～～you were～～ so close～!!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: The winning school was a cut above the rest, both in idea and execution… But that's exactly why… it's so frustrating, this.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Indeed. But we did our best.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: … sob…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ugh! As class president, I'm very frustrated as well! Nnnn!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: …? Identified a "giggle". What brought this on?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: … No, I just thought we really are students of Tracen Academy. We all aimed for a single goal… and we feel frustrated fall even one step short.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Because everyone is "dedicated to winning", we also all feel the frustration of losing…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: And so I'm certain everyone feels the same right now.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: —Next time, I want to win.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Exactly. Next time… Next time, let's win. Everyone!

text_block_list.name: All 4
text_block_list.text: Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: — Well then! Let's have a blast for the rest! I'm gonna stuff myself with chocolate!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Um, Jordan, where are you going?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: A "chocolate festival"! There's a buffet～, and there's gonna be a show with famous patissiers from all over the world, yeah?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Famous patissiers from all over the world…!? Well, I can't let that slip me by!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: … Heheh. We should have a look too, Ms. Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Ms. Flower. I have something for you.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I know it's a little early, but here it is. A must-have item, "The Best Friend Chocolate". Thank you very much for always helping me.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Hee- eeeh!? Th- thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: …I sense an "easing" in your expression… In fact, I was a little "worried" because I could sense the occasional "tension" in your expression.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: You are a "dependable" person. You have supported me as a roommate many times.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: That's why, when I heard the word "helper," I immediately thought to come to you.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I would like to make an effort to be a "reliable" person to you too, Ms. Flower. …That is to say, I hope you will continue to be my friend.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: … Ms. Bourbon… Were you…

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: —Ehehe. I'm glad to hear that. It's my pleasure… and I hope just the same!
